page.title: 07New Houses.
page.content: On the new houses next to the Hare and Hounds there is one chimney pot and one garage that can fit two cars in.There is a vent pipe sticking out of the roof it is to let air flow from and to the sewage system of the house.It has a patio around the back and a big porch at the front.All the windows are square or rectangle in shape.There is a hole around the back of the house which is called a soak away.Pipes from the roof come down into it and soak into the ground.When it is finished it is filled up with stones.The house that was built on the foundations of a bungalow has two chimney pots and a plaque which says when it was finished. It has an alarm system on the side and two garages.It also has a drive.There are no new houses in Lt Addington being built at present.
